objects.title: Good News â€“ Power (radio episode)
objects.creator: Robinson, Frank B.
objects.description: Example locally hosted audio item. Psychiana radio program episode begins with assurance that there is a Power that can get people what they desire. Robinson then discusses his early life failures and childhood seeking of some force that could turn his failures into success. He asserts the God-Power can turn our failures into success and bring us material and spiritual abundance.
objects.subject: Frank B. Robinson; Failure; Success; Material Abundance
objects.source: Psychiana Digital Collection, Digital Initiatives, University of Idaho Library, https://www.lib.uidaho.edu/digital/psychiana/
